job.title: Principal Software Engineer
job.description: pThe Principal Delivery Engineer is a critical member of the Information Management Services competency and will be responsible for the endend engineering of solutions that are deployed into the Viewpointe managed services environment Reporting to the Director of Service Delivery Engineering this position will work across all competencies while leading Engineering and technical Implementation services and staff across all levels of the enterpriseppnbspppEssential Duties and ResponsibilitiesppDuties include the following other duties may be assignedppnbspnbspnbspWill support the creation and maintenance of the solution blueprints updown the technology stack server database telecom network storage integration security accessauthorization MFT compute middleware and applicationsppnbspnbspnbspReview andor create the Solution and Implementation Documentation working across competencies to align requirements to engineered endend designs with sufficient detail to create the installation runbooks and change requestsppnbspnbspnbspSupport the provisioning and maintenance of cloudbased services Software Enterprise Database and Database as a Service Infrastructure as a Service storage systems and Windows or Linux based applicationsppnbspnbspnbspWork with vendors as required to support defectincident resolution and defined enhancements while supporting QA and Development life cyclesppnbspnbspnbspParticipate in architecture committees to support enterprise standardization within all solutioned and implemented managed servicesppnbspnbspnbspSupport L3 problem escalation and resolution for all managed services Monitor operational delivery to ensure a high level of availability and functionality to end users Oversight of service performance and trending to proactively avoid service impacts Provide documentation of troubleshooting procedures or problem resolution where requiredppnbspnbspnbspSupport escalated service outage recovery efforts while providing communication on technical issues to both internal and external groupsppnbspnbspnbspSupport the change management process and ensure the service maintains audit compliance and participate in internal and external auditsppnbspnbspnbspPlan Design and participate when required in Disaster Recovery testing or support actual failover scenariosppnbspnbspnbspEnsure the operational readiness of new deployments and defined supportability requirements leveraging tools and monitoring in test and production while maintaining product serviceability and scaleabilityppnbspnbspnbspInterface with Architecture and Development teams and participate in business requirement and technical specification design meetings both internally and customer facingppnbspnbspnbspEvaluate and make recommendations for technical and process improvements as they relate to the infrastructure middleware applications and Cloudbased technologies with the ability to provide alternative technical solutions or approach if requiredppnbspnbspnbspTranslate traditional onprem datacenter technology concepts into cloudbased technology components and servicesppnbspnbspnbspSupport development of build process configuration design and procedure documentationppnbspnbspnbspSupport design and implementation of Performance Management tools to ensure solutions meet Service Level Agreement SLA metricsppnbspnbspnbspLead Engineering and operations team members and participate in customer support of software applicationsmiddleware in Customer Test and Production environmentsppnbspnbspnbspProvide oversight and consult for new customer implementations and provide Level 3 technical support for Managed Services once they are deployed into productionppnbspnbspnbspTranslate Engineered Solutions into tasks and dependencies while managing timelines and Agile schedules with project management teamsppnbspnbspnbspKeep leadership and project management team well informed on status of implementation effortsppnbspnbspnbspMay be engaged during 7x24 oncall rotations to support Operational L3 escalations onlyp
